sub_title: Manager a.i. - New Product Introduction team within the QC department at Janssen Biologics B.V.
summary:
As a Manager a.i. at Janssen Pharmaceuticals and an graduate in Pharmaceutical Business Administration, I want to contribute in making and selling reliable, good and safe medicines.

I stand for openness, honesty, reliability, respect and commitment. In addition, I can switch quickly, I’m decisive and solution-oriented. 
I’m able to analyze and improve the quality processes in the Pharmaceutical field. In addition, I can develop and implement these processes. All this by continuously evaluating these quality processes. I’m also capable of working effectively on a project basis in the Pharmaceutical field.

school.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)

Hoger Algemeen Voortgezet Onderwijs / School of higher general secondary education

certifications.name: Certified Project Leader (FPX - Flawless Project Execution)

company.name: The Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson

profile_positions.company: The Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson
profile_positions.description:
Manager a.i. Quality Control - New Product Introduction team at Janssen Biologics B.V. 
Within this role I'm responsible to support the new product introduction at the Janssen Leiden site for the Leiden Quality Control organization. This means:
Managing the team of the Quality Control New Product Introduction department (17 persons): personal coaching and leading of Specialists (from associate Analysts till Scientists).
- General point of contact for all (to be) introduced new products to be tested by QC Leiden 
- Budgeting and forecasting
profile_positions.title: Manager a.i. Quality Control - New Product Introduction team at Janssen Biologics B.V.

profile_positions.company: The Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson
profile_positions.description:
Sr. Supervisor Quality Control - New Product Introduction team at Janssen Biologics B.V.  
Within this role I'm responsible to support the new product introduction at the Janssen Leiden site for the Leiden Quality Control organization. This means:
Manage a sub-team of the Quality Control New Product Introduction department (11 persons): personal coaching and leading of Specialists.
- Single point of contact within QC for all new products to be produced in Leiden (Phase 1 / PPQ)
- Budgeting and forecasting
- Backup NPI Manager
profile_positions.title: Sr. Supervisor Quality Control - New Product Introduction team at Janssen Biologics B.V.

profile_positions.company: The Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson
profile_positions.description:
Scientist - New Product Introduction team within Leiden OneLab at Janssen Biologics B.V. 
Within this role I'm responsible to support the new product introduction at the Janssen Leiden site for the JSC Leiden QC organization. This means:
- Leading the Analytical Method Transfers for Phase 1 till PPQ products
- Leading the product qualifications for compendial methods for Phase 1 till PPQ products
- Create and coordinate the process sampling flow for Phase 1 till phase 3 products
- Coordinate the new raw material introductions for all products at the Janssen Leiden & Cork site 
- Coordinate the raw material readiness for the Phase 1 till phase 3 products at the Janssen Leiden site
- Single point of contact for all raw material activities within the NPI team
- Single point of contact within QC for all new early phase products to be produced in Leiden
- Managing QC NPI related Quality Investigations 
- People leader for 3-6 direct reports
profile_positions.title: Scientist Quality Control - New Product Introduction team at Janssen Biologics B.V.

profile_positions.company: The Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson
profile_positions.description:
Manage the Quality Control Raw Material department (15 persons): personal coaching and leading of 1 Supervisor and 4 Specialists.  
Supervise, coordinate raw material testing and release for the Janssen site in Leiden and Cork (Ireland).  
Leading projects and participate in projects, to support & to optimize the lab and organization (local and global) and to implement new products to the Janssen Leiden site.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Supervisor Quality Control - Raw Materials at Janssen Biologics B.V.

profile_positions.company: The Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson
profile_positions.description:
Manage QC In Process Control department (23 persons): personal coaching and leading of 2 Teamleaders and 2 Specialists. 
Supervise, coordinate In Process testing and release for the Janssen site in Leiden. 
Leading projects and participate in projects, to support, to optimize the lab and organization (local and global) and to implement new products to the Janssen Leiden site.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Supervisor Quality Control - In Process Control at Janssen Biologics B.V.

profile_positions.company: The Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson
profile_positions.description:
Manage QC Support team (15 persons): personal coaching and leading of 8 specialists, 4 (Sr) Technicians and 3 lab assistants.
Supervise, coordinate change controls and deviations. 
Supervise, coordinate lab systems support (like  LIMS, Empower 3 and LES). 
Supervise, coordinate sample logistics and lab supply.  
Leading projects and participate in projects, to support, to optimize the lab and organization (local and global) and to implement new products to the Janssen Leiden site.
profile_positions.title: Ad Interim Sr. Supervisor Quality Control - Support at Janssen Biologics B.V.

profile_positions.company: The Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson
profile_positions.description:
Manage QC Raw Materials team (7 persons): personal coaching and leading of 7 (Jr/Sr) Technicians. 
Supervise, coordinate raw material testing and release for the Janssen Supply Chain (JSC). Leading projects and participate in projects, to support, to optimize the lab and organization (local and global) and to implement new products to the Janssen Leiden site.
QC Project Lead to implement a new lab system LES (Lab Executing System). 
Lead a local project team (6 persons) and participate in a global team (as site implementation lead).

Participate in projects, to support and to optimize the lab.
